turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to order two medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One I'd like veggie lovers and the other I'd like meat lovers but both of them need extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that bella luna's charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium pizzas with extra cheese, one veggie lovers and one meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $40 is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that tip is not included in your total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 45 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
